title: Adding eSIM to Pixel 3a
content:
I have a Pixel 3a XL. Glad that DSDS was activated/ official for Pixel 3a series. After updating to Android 10 on release day, I tried to add esim to my phone to use 2 SIMs. 

OK, I tried using an esim from a carrier that specifically stated that they did not guarantee their eSIM will work with Pixel phones as they only supported the fruit phones. So with that in mind, I went ahead nevertheless and obtained the eSIM QR code from the carrier ("Carrier 1"). Followed the usual process to add eSIM: -
Settings -> Network & Internet -> "+" Mobile Network -> "Don't have SIM card" -> "Checking network info..." -> camera automatically fired-up to scan the given QR code;
scanned the QR code of Carrier 1; and
received error message "Networks not activated".

OK, fine.... Carrier 1 already said they did not guarantee their eSIM will work on Pixel.

And after some forum discussions with fellow users in the same country who succesfully added esim to their Pixel 3 (not 3a) using other carriers who also specifically stated that they only supported the fruit phones, I decided to instead try another carrier's eSIM ("Carrier 2").

Prior to trying to Carrier 2, these were the intervening matters: -
network settings (only) were reset, including checking the box to reset "downloaded sims"; and
updated apps - including "SIM Manager" by Google [current version D.1.5.73-google (5793666)].

So went to Carrier 2's store and requested their eSIM. Again, followed the usual process to add eSIM: - 
Settings -> Network & Internet -> "+" Mobile Network -> "Don't have SIM card" -> "Checking network info..." -> 
camera DIDN'T fire-up at all to scan the given QR; and
received error message "Networks not activated".
 After, the above, I reset the phone back to factory settings and tried again. Same result as per trying to add Carrier 2's eSIM above. NOT EVEN a chance to scan the QR code and was again and again informed "Networks not activated"...

What seems to be the problem? Could it be the "SIM Manager" app's latest update?

Thanks in advance.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
